Terminal Overload
Home Forum Chat Code Wiki

TOL is an innovative, fast-paced, free and open source multiplayer FPS.
It is the continuation of Revenge Of The Cats: Ethernet.

GNU/Linux 32bit Windows 32bit
source & other releases
Empty servers? Look at our Online Server Browser -or- scheduled play sessions
$upport us: register your nick -or- become a patron of TOLs main developer

  • Version 0.3.1

    2014-10-13

    • Use own master server(s). Only fall back on GG master server if they all fail.

  • Version 0.3.0

    2014-10-11

    • New map: ETH5
    • Prettier GUI
    • Replace re-jumping with instant & charged x-jump.
    • Tweak CAT movement speeds.
    • Simplify disc controls.
    • ETH mode: Each class only has one type of offensive disc.
    • SMG changes: Increase firing rate, decrease damage, shorter range.
    • MGL changes: Remove recoil, decrease firing rate, fire only one projectile.
    • MG changes: Projectiles are affected by gravity.
    • Remove etherboard from class #4 (Minigunner) loadout.
    • Remove SG2 from class #2 loadout.
    • Improve responsiveness of mouse look while in CAT form.
    • New projectile visuals (except discs & grenade).
    • Various minor tweaks and improvements
    • Bugfixes
